summary: This bill, the Healthy Food Financing Initiative Reauthorization Act of 2025, aims to amend the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994. The bill reauthorizes the Healthy Food Financing Initiative, providing mandatory funding from the Commodity Credit Corporation for the initiative, increasing from $25 million in fiscal year 2026 to $50 million annually from fiscal year 2030 onward. The legislation was introduced in the House of Representatives on May 20, 2025.
